title: Get Portfolio Request
description: Request parameters for retrieving a portfolio. Used by both orchestrators and seller agents to fetch portfolio details and ad tags.

format_ids.description: Filter to specific formats. Creative agent may adapt/generate missing formats if possible.

include_previews.description: Include preview_url and thumbnail_url for each creative

include_ad_tags.description: Include ad_tag field with full markup. Set to false for metadata-only responses.

auto_build.description: If requested formats don't exist, build them on-demand. Enables lazy loading workflows where seller agents can request formats as needed.
